alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Morgan; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 10:56AM EST until March 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River from Noblesville to Hazleton. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to previous rainfall over the weekend. Minor flooding is largely expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. Moderate flooding in the Seymour area on the East Fork White River is expected to persist into Thursday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River near Centerton. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.4 feet, Road just north of Blue Bluff Bridge has about six inches of water on it. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EST Wednesday was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1100 PM EST /1000 PM CST/.
